definition: (idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour

sentences.english: These traditional disciplines and the use of bamboo weapons remain alive today.
sentences.chinese: 这些传统学科以及竹制武器的使用一直延续至今。

sentences.english: She has been doctoring since before you were born.
sentences.chinese: 从你们出生前至今，她一直在行医。

sentences.english: So he can't know, yet, that death doesn't really mean anything in comics.
sentences.chinese: 因而至今他也不知道死亡在漫画中没什么实际意义。

sentences.english: The best preserved temple of Egyptian antiquity in Edfu.
sentences.chinese: 埃德福神庙是埃及至今保存最完好的神庙。

sentences.english: Putin\'s rise continues to perplex even devoted Kremlin observers.
sentences.chinese: 普京的崛起至今让克林姆林宫的观察家们感到迷惑。

sentences.english: It remains a historic mystery whether Emperor Yongzheng was murdered.
sentences.chinese: 是否被刺身亡至今仍是一个历史的谜案。

sentences.english: Dunga had been in charge of his country since 2006, succeeding Carlos Alberto Parreira.
sentences.chinese: 邓加在06年取代佩雷拉成为国家队主帅至今。

sentences.english: However, all the figures have yet to come home braving persons.
sentences.chinese: 然而，所有的数字家园掘金者至今尚未如愿以偿。

sentences.english: The remains of Beddgelert lie there to this very day.
sentences.chinese: 贝德格勒特至今留在那里。

sentences.english: So far they have 17 women from all over the world who have been nominated.
sentences.chinese: 至今在全球范围内已经有17位女性被提名。

sentences.english: Her spirit and compassion live on today.
sentences.chinese: 她的精神和悲天悯人至今仍留存于世。

sentences.english: One 1970 stop still gives him chills.
Increment the revenue to date for the district.
sentences.chinese: 增加该地区至今为止的收入。

sentences.english: Because, we Swedes, without herrings , we, Scandinavian country, we couldn't live.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典人和北欧人没有鲱鱼即无法存活至今。

sentences.english: The two sides since the debate continues.
sentences.chinese: 两方辩论至今仍在继续。

sentences.english: It is not clear what actually provoked their abduction.
sentences.chinese: 究竟什么导致他们被绑架，至今仍不清楚。

definition: (idiom) up to the present/even now/now (in contrast with the past)/at this late hour
straight (in a straight line)/continuously/always/from the beginning of ... up to .../all along
until/(used in combination with words like 到[dao4] or 至[zhi4] in constructs of the form 到...為止|到...为止)
despite/although/even though/in spite of/unhesitatingly/do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc)/(go ahead and do it) without hesitating
